about-advisors-brendan: Umuyobozi mukuru. Umuyobozi uzwi muri AI. Yakoresheje ubwenge bwimashini murwego rwibibazo bitandukanye byubucuruzi mumyaka mirongo ishize.
about-advisors-dawn: PhD muri comptational Biology, Stanford. Gukorana numuyoboro udasanzwe kuva 1999. Wibande kuri ML ikoreshwa hamwe no kwiga byimbitse.
about-advisors-keiran: Ububikoshingiro ninzobere. Injeniyeri kare muri Cloudera nibindi byinshi. Imyaka icumi yubuhanga bwubaka software hamwe nitsinda.
about-content-text-1: hCaptcha ni serivisi ya Intuition Machines Inc, AI hamwe na sosiyete yiga imashini yibanda kuri metalearning hamwe na domeni ya ML ku gipimo. Twubaka kandi dukora sisitemu nini cyane kugirango dushoboze serivisi zo gusesengura amashusho n'amashusho ku masosiyete ya Global 2000 ku isi.
about-content-text-2: Amakuru menshi muri rusange atanga ibisubizo byiza. Kubaka no kubungabunga neza byanditse kandi bifatika bijyanye namakuru aratwara igihe kandi ahenze. hCaptcha yabanje gutunganywa kugirango dukemure ibyo dukeneye mu kuranga amashusho, kandi ubu iraboneka kubindi bigo bifite ibyo bisa.
about-intro-text: Turakura vuba kandi buri gihe dushakisha impano nziza kwisi kurwego rwibiro byisi. Urashobora gusaba hamwe nu murongo ukurikira.
about-leadership-alex: Ububikoshingiro ninzobere. Injeniyeri kare muri Cloudera nibindi byinshi. Imyaka icumi yubuhanga bwubaka software hamwe nitsinda.
about-leadership-eli: Umuyobozi mukuru. Umuyobozi uzwi muri AI. Yakoresheje ubwenge bwimashini murwego rwibibazo bitandukanye byubucuruzi mumyaka mirongo ishize.
about-leadership-todd: PhD muri comptational Biology, Stanford. Gukorana numuyoboro udasanzwe kuva 1999. Wibande kuri ML ikoreshwa hamwe no kwiga byimbitse.
acc-opt-text: Waba ufite ubumuga bwo kutabona cyangwa ubundi ntushobora kurangiza hCaptchas?
appreciate-in: Twishimiye ibitekerezo byanyu. Tumenyeshe ibibazo byose kandi tuzabikemura vuba.
feedback-text: Tanga ibitekerezo kuri hCaptcha umaze kubona
footer-copyright-text: hCaptcha ni ikirango cyanditse cya Intuition Machines, Inc.
home-about-text-1: hCaptcha yashizweho kugirango ikemure ikibazo cyibikorwa byinshi byakazi mukwiga imashini: kuranga umubare munini wamakuru muburyo bwihuse, buhendutse, kandi bwizewe.
home-about-text-2: Amakuru menshi muri rusange atanga ibisubizo byiza muburyo bwo kwiga imashini yiga. Intsinzi iheruka yicyitegererezo cyimbitse yatumye habaho imibare nini cyane, hafi buri gihe hamwe nabantu bamwe basubiramo. Ariko, gukora imibare minini yasuzumwe nabantu ikoresheje Mechanical Turk, Igicapo Umunani, nibindi biratinda kandi bihenze.
home-about-text-3: hCaptcha yemerera imbuga za interineti kubona amafaranga atanga iki cyifuzo mugihe uhagarika bots nubundi buryo bwo guhohoterwa.
home-about-text-4: Isoko rya hCaptcha rikoreshwa na Protokole ya HUMAN, protocole ifunguye yegerejwe abaturage kugirango isuzume abantu ikorera kuri Ethereum. Imbuga zinjiza Tokens ya muntu (HMT) igihe cyose abakoresha bakoresha widget ya hCaptcha kurubuga rwabo, kandi ibigo byiga imashini byishyura abantu Tokens kugirango babone amakuru yabo.
home-benefits-text-1: Wabonye ko burigihe ukanze kumodoka ufasha gutoza sisitemu imwe yo kwiga imashini ya Gigantic kubuntu?
home-benefits-text-2: hCaptcha ihindura iyi moderi. Iyo ukoresheje hCaptcha, ibigo bisaba akazi abakoresha bawe bakora nkuko byerekana ubumuntu bwabo. Urabona ibihembo.
home-benefits-text-3: Urashaka gusubiza mubikorwa ukunda? hCaptcha igufasha gushyigikira abagiraneza wahisemo hamwe ninjiza wunguka kuyikoresha. Abakoresha kurubuga rwawe vuba bazashobora kubona umusanzu wawe mubikorwa byurukundo binyuze mubirango byubwenge kuri interineti ya hCaptcha.
home-challenges-text-1: ... n'indi mirimo yoroshye. Biroroshye kubantu, biragoye kuri bots.
home-challenges-text-2: Imirimo yihariye nayo iraboneka kubatangaza imishinga.
home-intro-body: Ukoresha capcha kugirango wirinde bots? hCaptcha irinda ubuzima bwite bwabakoresha, ihemba imbuga za interineti, kandi ifasha ibigo kubona amakuru yabyo. Nibitonyanga bisimburwa kuri reCAPTCHA: urashobora guhinduka muminota mike.
home-intro-head: Hagarika bots nyinshi. Tangira kurinda ubuzima bwite bwabakoresha.
home-main-1: Wenyine. Umutekano. Byihuta. Kandi turakwishura kugirango uyikoreshe.
home-main-2c: Imiyoboro yamamaza ibona abashyitsi bawe nkibicuruzwa. Kuri hCaptcha ibicuruzwa nakazi batanga. Ntabwo dushishikajwe no gukoresha abakoresha bawe, gusa birashoboka ko bashobora kuba babi. Dushyigikiye ibikorwa nkibanga ryibanga, kandi dukora cyane kugirango duhuze ubuzima bwite numutekano.
home-main-3c: Ukuri ni inyungu zawe kandi ni izacu. hCaptcha yibanze kubamamaza. Turakora kugirango tuguhe amakuru nyayo kandi tureke guhitamo uko uyakoresha. Izindi capchas zitangwa na
home-main-3c2: ibigo byamamaza. Ibi bivuze ko bot yose bahagaritse irashobora kugabanya amafaranga yinjira.
home-main-4c: Imashini zigezweho zo kwiga imashini zikoreshwa na hCaptcha muguhitamo ikiremwamuntu. Ibi biradusaba gusaba imirimo idahwitse kubakoresha kandi tugafata umwanya muto wo kubikora, mugihe ugikora amakuru yingirakamaro yanditseho abakiriya.
home-main-plans: hCaptcha nubuntu bwo gukoresha kubatangaza ubunini ubwo aribwo bwose. Ariko, kubigo na platform bikeneye kugenzurwa cyane, ibisubizo byibikorwa byacu birahari.
home-main-plans2: hCaptcha ibisubizo byibikorwa birinda miriyoni yabakoresha kurubuga rwa miriyoni mirongo kurubuga rwa bimwe mubigo bikomeye kwisi. Nyamuneka twandikire kubindi bisobanuro, cyangwa gusura
home-main-plans3: hCaptcha ibisubizo byibikorwa birinda miriyoni yabakoresha kurubuga rwa miriyoni mirongo kurubuga rwa bimwe mubigo bikomeye kwisi. Nyamuneka twandikire kubindi bisobanuro, cyangwa gusura
home-plans-chart-row-6-cell-1: Politiki y’ibanga ya GDPR na CCPA
home-try-it-out-text: HCaptcha itanga ibintu byoroshye, byoroshye, kandi byizewe gutahura bot mugihe ari nto kubantu bakemura.
labeling-about-text-1: hCaptcha yashizweho kugirango ikemure ikibazo cyibanda cyane kubikorwa byo kwiga imashini; kuranga umubare munini wamakuru muburyo bwihuse, buhendutse, kandi bwizewe. Amakuru menshi muri rusange atanga ibisubizo byiza muburyo bwo kwiga imashini yiga. Intsinzi iheruka yicyitegererezo cyimbitse yatumye habaho imibare nini cyane, kandi hCaptcha ikora iki gikenewe.
labeling-about-text-2: Ariko, gukora imibare nini yasuzumwe nabantu ukoresheje uburyo gakondo biratinda kandi bihenze. hCaptcha nuburyo bwibigo kugirango babone ibisobanuro bakeneye byihuse, hamwe nubwiza buhanitse kandi ku giciro gito ugereranije nubundi buryo.
labeling-annotations-text-1: Kumenya neza ibintu mumashusho na videwo
labeling-annotations-text-2: Kumenya neza ibintu mumashusho na videwo
labeling-annotations-text-4: Gutondeka cyangwa kongeramo ibyiciro uko bishakiye
labeling-annotations-text-6: Ukeneye ubundi bwoko butanditswe hano? Tubaze.
labeling-ent-button: Menyesha itsinda ryacu rishinzwe gukemura ibibazo
labeling-ent-text-1: Ihuriro rya HUMAN inyuma ya hCaptcha ritanga ubuhanga buhanitse bwakazi hamwe nubuyobozi bukoreshwa binyuze mubikorwa, bivangavanze, cyangwa SaaS byoherejwe hamwe na sisitemu zisanzweho.
labeling-ent-text-2: Koresha rwose kumurongo hamwe nabakozi bawe bwite, ukurikirane agaciro gakoreshwa mubice byubucuruzi cyangwa abafatanyabikorwa ba consortium, hitamo inzira uhitamo imirimo itandukanye itanga abakozi bo mumbere cyangwa hanze bashingiye kubiciro nibisabwa mumutekano, nibindi byinshi.
labeling-ent-text-3: Kubona byoroshye API, ibyapa byiza, hamwe nubuhanga bugezweho-muri-tekinoroji kugirango twongere imikorere.
labeling-ent-text-4: 99,99% amasaha yo hejuru SLAs na 24/7 inkunga yisi yose irahari. Kubindi bisobanuro:
labeling-features-head-2: Gukwirakwiza ibiciro hamwe nubuziranenge. Nta masezerano yo hejuru asabwa.
labeling-features-head-4: Tanga amakuru yawe bwite yukuri cyangwa reka tuyubake hejuru.
labeling-features-text-1: Urashaka kwinjiza ibitekerezo byabantu mubikorwa byawe byubucuruzi? Dutanga SLAs yizewe cyane, ubushobozi bwizewe, hamwe na REST APIs yoroshye.
labeling-features-text-2: Ihuriro rya HUMAN rikoresha icyitegererezo cyicyizere cyo gukora isesengura ryiza-nyaryo-nyaryo. Ibi biradufasha kumenya byihuse ingorane zibibazo nibisubizo bishoboka, bikagutwara igihe namafaranga.
labeling-features-text-3: Ibibazo byose ntabwo ari bimwe. Ibisobanuro kubikorwa byumutekano birashobora gusaba 99,99% icyizere kubakozi bose. Ibisobanuro kubintu bimwe bya beta muri porogaramu yimikino igendanwa birashobora gusaba gusa ikizere giciriritse. Urahitamo.
labeling-features-text-4: Ufite amakuru yibanze adafite igenzura ryuzuye? Mubihe byinshi dushobora kubaka imwe kuri wewe nkibikorwa bikoreshwa muri sisitemu, cyangwa gukora ibyapa byanditse kugirango ubyemeze.
labeling-info-text-1: Vugana numwe mubahanga bacu kugirango tumenye ibikenewe byumushinga: intego nyayo, imiterere, nibisabwa bidasanzwe.
labeling-info-text-2: Dukora umurimo muto wo gukora dushingiye kumibare yawe y'icyitegererezo. Ibi biragerageza akazi twakoranye kugirango tumenye neza ibyo ukeneye.
labeling-info-text-3: Hamwe nijwi ryacu ryinshi nubukererwe buke tuzahindura akazi kawe vuba, hamwe nogutanga byikora mugihe birangiye.
labeling-info-text-4: Mugihe twunvise neza ibipimo byimirimo yawe yo kubyara, ibisubizo bizakomeza gutera imbere mugihe.
labeling-info-text-5: Ikibaho kizima kigufasha gutanga ibitekerezo cyangwa guhagarika umusaruro umwanya uwariwo wose.
labeling-main-1c: Ukeneye ibirango byinshi kuri datasets yawe? hCaptcha itanga amakuru yihuse, ihendutse, kandi yujuje ubuziranenge yamakuru yibigo bikora ubwenge bwubuhanga hamwe no kwiga imashini.
labeling-main-2c: hCaptcha ifite kimwe mubidendezi binini kwisi biboneka kugirango ukoreshe. Igipimo cyanyu cyose, turashobora kugikora tutarinze kwiyemeza imbere. Amamiriyoni yimirimo kumunsi ntakibazo.
labeling-platform-text: hCaptcha yubatswe kuri platifomu ya HUMAN, ituma inzira nisesengura bihanitse bigamije kunoza ibiciro no gukora neza kuri buri ntambwe. Iri koranabuhanga rireka abakozi bakwiriye gukora buri gice cyakazi kawe, bikagufasha gukoresha neza ibiciro mugihe urinda ubuzima bwite kandi wujuje ibisabwa byose bishobora gukurikizwa.
labeling-try-text: ... twiteguye iyo uri: serivise yacu iraboneka kumasaha.
page-acc-faq-1: Ikibazo: HCaptcha Igice 508 + WCAG 2.0 cyujuje? Igisubizo: Turabyizera: abakoresha bose bafite uburyo ubwo aribwo bwose bwo kubangamira bashoboye kureba kurubuga no kwandika inyandiko kumpapuro barashobora kubona serivisi zirinzwe na hCaptcha bamaze kwiyandikisha. Ariko, iyi ntabwo ari inama zemewe n'amategeko: ugomba gukora isuzuma ryawe bwite, ukurikije ibyo washyize mubikorwa kugirango umenye neza ko aribyo byoherejwe.
page-acc-faq-2: Ikibazo: Urimo gukora kubindi bisobanuro (a11y), nkamajwi? Igisubizo: Kera ibyamamare nka majwi yafashwe ivangura abakoresha benshi a11y kandi biratsindwa byoroshye nubuhanga bugezweho bwo kwiga imashini. Ibi byatumye ibibazo byamajwi bigenda byiyongera cyane, bitangiza urusaku, ibihe bidasanzwe, guhuza amagambo adasanzwe, nibindi kugirango batsinde abateye. Ntabwo dushishikajwe cyane nubu buryo no kwirinda ibibazo burundu, ariko tuzabisuzuma niba hari ibisabwa umuryango wa a11y. Ariko, dushishikajwe cyane na Pass Pass yi dosiye yo gukoresha. Twizera ko guhuza uburyo bwacu bwa a11y hamwe nogutanga Pass Pass bizemerera abakoresha a11y gushakisha neza, umutekano mumenye ko traffic yabo yigenga, mugihe hagabanywa ihohoterwa ryabakoresha bot byanze bikunze bibaho mugihe amahitamo ya11y ahari. Turi abitabira cyane mumatsinda ya IETF ikora ubu buryo bushya.
page-acc-faq-3: Ikibazo: Tuvuge iki ku buzima bwite? Kwiyandikisha byerekana amakuru a11yashakisha muburyo bumwe? Ukora iki kuri imeri? Igisubizo: hCaptcha yagenewe ubuzima bwite kuva hasi. Iratandukanye cyane namahitamo gakondo nka reCAPTCHA ifitwe numuyoboro wamamaza, ufite ubushake bwo kugukurikirana kurubuga no kuguhuza nindangamuntu nyayo. Ntabwo dukoresha imeri imeri cyangwa amakuru kubintu byose usibye koroshya gukoresha11 no gukumira ihohoterwa. Politiki y’ibanga yacu ifite ibisubizo byuzuye kandi byemewe kuburyo dukoresha amakuru, ariko igisubizo kigufi nuko nta nyungu dufite zo kuguhuza nkumuntu ufite amateka yawe yo gushakisha.Turi kandi ubu turimo gukora igisubizo cyibanga kugirango twamagane byihuse aderesi imeri yawe mugihe tukibungabunga ubushobozi bwacu bwo gukumira ihohoterwa, ryuzuza akazi kacu k'ibanga.
page-acc-link-1: Niba uri umukoresha, nyamuneka iyandikishe hano.
page-acc-subhead: Kugenzura niba abakoresha bose badahwema kubungabunga umutekano
page-acc-summary-contents-1: hCaptcha yagenewe guhagarika bots mubitandukanya nabantu. Ibizamini biboneka nigikoresho cyoroshye kuri ibi, ariko ntabwo buriwese ashobora gukemura ikibazo kiboneka. Kubera iyo mpamvu, twateguye ubundi buryo bworoshye, butababaza kureka abamamaji bakoresha serivise yacu ikabika abantu bose hamwe byuzuye 508 hamwe na WCAG 2.0.
page-acc-summary-contents-2: Uburyo ikora: ubanza, umukoresha ashobora kwiyandikisha kuriyi URL, ihujwe nurupapuro rwamakuru rwa widget ya hCaptcha. Bahabwa kuki ihishe ishobora gukoreshwa inshuro nyinshi kumunsi, ariko igomba gusubirwamo buri masaha 24 ikoresheje kwinjira.Iyo ikibazo cyerekanwe kubakoresha kugerwaho kurubuga urwo arirwo rwose bakoresheje serivisi ya hCaptcha, bazahita batambuka.
page-acc-tr-body: Ikibazo: Ndacyabona ikibazo nyuma yo gushiraho kuki. Ni iki kibitera? Igisubizo: Ibi mubisanzwe biterwa no gukoresha adresse yamamaza cyangwa kwagura anti-kuki, cyangwa igenamiterere rihagarika kuki zambukiranya urubuga, muriki gihe kuki ya hcaptcha.com yashyizweho cyangwa igenzurwa na JavaCcript ya HCaptcha kurubuga rutandukanye. , nkuwo usuye. hCaptcha igerwaho kuki ikorana nabashakishwa bose bakunzwe hamwe nabahagarika kwamamaza hamwe nibisanzwe bisanzwe, mubisanzwe rero kunanirwa biterwa ninyandiko zirwanya anti-adblock cyangwa amategeko asa nayo yibanda kurubuga runaka. Igisubizo: 1. Whitelist hcaptcha.com na * .hcaptcha.com kuki muguhagarika kwamamaza cyangwa kwagura umutekano wa mushakisha. 2. Niba ukoresha mushakisha ya Brave, idafite (guhera muri Mata 2020) isa nkaho ifite ubwoko ubwo aribwo bwose bwa whitelist, jya kuri Preferences -> Shields -> Cookies hanyuma uhitemo Emerera Cookies zose. 3. Niba ukoresha verisiyo yanyuma ya Safari kuri OS X 10.15 iherutse gusohoka cyangwa iOS 13. 4, Apple imaze guhindura imyitwarire ya Safari ijyanye na kuki zindi zitatu, ibuza byose kubusa. Turimo gushyira mubikorwa igisubizo, ariko hagati aho nyamuneka sura Ibyifuzo bya Safari, igice cyibanga, hamwe no kugenzura kurubuga: Irinde gukurikira imbuga kugirango ushoboze kuki ishobora gukora nkuko byari byitezwe. Ikibazo: Nkoresha ibikoresho byinshi. Nkeneye kwiyandikisha inshuro nyinshi? Igisubizo: Oya. Nyamuneka kanda ihuza rimwe rya imeri yoherejwe kuri buri gikoresho ukoresha kugirango ushireho kuki.
page-acc-tr-title: Kubakoresha Abakoresha: Ikibazo n'Ikibazo cyo gukemura ibibazo
priv-hc-text: Imiyoboro yamamaza ikubona nkibicuruzwa byabo. Ntabwo. Ntabwo dushishikajwe no gukoresha abo ari bo, gusa birashoboka ko bashobora kuba babi. Dushyigikiye ibikorwa nkibanga ryibanga, kandi dukora cyane kugirango duhuze ubuzima bwite numutekano.
reporting-bugs-accessibility-text: Waba ufite ubumuga bwo kutabona cyangwa ubundi udashobora kurangiza hCaptchas?
reporting-bugs-guide-ff-step-1: Intambwe ya 1: Fungura ibikoresho byabateza imbere (Ibi bitangira gufata amajwi.)
reporting-bugs-guide-ff-step-2: Intambwe ya 2: Kanda ahanditse Network mubikoresho byabateza imbere. Reba agasanduku k'ibiti bya Persist hejuru.
reporting-bugs-guide-ff-step-3: Intambwe ya 3: sura https://accounts.hcaptcha.com/demo, cyangwa urubuga ufite ikibazo kuri (Icyitonderwa cyibanga: gusa niba udashaka gusangira ibyo aribyo) ... hanyuma ukande I am buto yumuntu, kandi ugerageze gukemura.
reporting-bugs-guide-ff-step-4: Intambwe ya 4: Kanda HAR nyuma yo kugerageza gukemura, hanyuma uhitemo Kubika Byose nka HAR kugirango ubike logi y'urusobe. Ohereza iyo dosiye.
reporting-bugs-guide-ff-step-5: Intambwe ya 5: Kanda ahanditse Console, hanyuma ukande iburyo hanyuma uhitemo byose hanyuma ubike muri dosiye yinyandiko, kugirango ubike logi ya konsole. Ohereza natwe.
reporting-bugs-guide-ff-step-6: Intambwe yanyuma: Ohereza ubutumwa kuri dosiye ya HAR na konsole kuri twe, hanyuma usobanure ikibazo Koresha: support@hcaptcha.com (nyamuneka koresha serivise nka Dropbox cyangwa Filebin hanyuma wohereze amahuza) hanyuma uhitemo amashusho, niba ukeka ko hari ikintu kitagaragaza neza . Nyamuneka ohereza IP ukoresha nayo. Urashobora kuyikura kuri https://www.whatsmyip.org/ Urakoze gufata umwanya wo kudufasha kubona aya makuru! Twiyemeje gukora hCaptcha ikora neza kuri buri wese.
reporting-bugs-guide-step-1: Intambwe ya 1: Fungura ibikoresho byabateza imbere (Ibi bitangira gufata amajwi.)
reporting-bugs-guide-step-2: Intambwe ya 2: Kanda ahanditse Network mubikoresho byabateza imbere. Reba ahanditse Kubika agasanduku kari hejuru.
reporting-bugs-guide-step-3: Intambwe ya 3: sura https://accounts.hcaptcha.com/demo, cyangwa urubuga ufite ikibazo kuri (Icyitonderwa cyibanga: gusa niba udashaka gusangira ibyo aribyo) ... hanyuma ukande I am buto yumuntu, kandi ugerageze gukemura.
reporting-bugs-guide-step-4: Intambwe ya 4: Kanda Kohereza HAR (umwambi muto wo hasi) nyuma yo kugerageza gukemura, ibika logi y'urusobe. Ohereza iyo dosiye.
reporting-bugs-guide-step-5: Intambwe ya 5: Kanda ahanditse Konsole, hanyuma ukande iburyo hanyuma ubike nka .. kugirango ubike logi ya konsole. Ohereza natwe.
reporting-bugs-guide-step-6: Intambwe yanyuma: Ohereza ubutumwa kuri HAR hamwe na konsole ya dosiye yoherejwe, hanyuma usobanure ikibazo. Koresha: inkunga@hcaptcha.com (nyamuneka koresha serivise nka Dropbox cyangwa Filebin hanyuma wohereze amahuza) hanyuma uhitemo amashusho, niba ukeka ko hari ikintu kitagaragaye neza. Nyamuneka ohereza IP ukoresha nayo. Urashobora kuyikura kuri https://www.whatsmyip.org/ Urakoze gufata umwanya wo kudufasha kubona aya makuru! Twiyemeje gukora hCaptcha ikora neza kuri buri wese.
reporting-bugs-guide-text-1: Kohereza amakuru yo gukemura hamwe na raporo yawe bizatworohera cyane kumenya ibibera. Hano hari intambwe ku yindi amabwiriza:
reporting-bugs-guide-text-2: Niba uri umushinga wurubuga cyangwa umukoresha winzobere, incamake twifuzaga ko utwoherereza umuyoboro wandika HAR hamwe namakuru ya mushakisha ya konsole. Nyamuneka gerageza guhagarika iyamamaza iryo ariryo ryose cyangwa iyongerekana ry'umutekano rya mushakisha mbere hanyuma ugerageze mbere yuko unyura muri izi ntambwe. Niba ibyo bikemuye ikibazo cyawe, turacyashimira kutumenyesha verisiyo ya mushakisha yawe, iyamamaza ryamamaza cyangwa iyagurwa rya mushakisha, hamwe nurubuga rwa URL.
reporting-bugs-intro-text: Abantu babarirwa muri za miriyoni bakoresha hCaptcha buri kwezi, ku bihumbi ibihumbi bya mushakisha, kwagura, ibikoresho, firewall, nibindi byinshi. Intego yacu nukureba neza ko buri gihe igukorera, turashima cyane raporo zawe! Gutanga ibitekerezo byihuse, kanda buto yohereze ibitekerezo. Niba ubona ikibazo gikora, nyamuneka ukurikize amabwiriza yo gukuramo amabwiriza ya Chrome cyangwa amabwiriza yo gukuramo amabwiriza ya Firefox hepfo. Kubandi bashakisha bose twohereze imeri. Kubibazo byumutekano cyangwa ibibazo byihariye, reba amabwiriza hepfo.
reporting-bugs-privacy-text: Ntabwo dushishikajwe no gukoresha abakoresha abo ari bo, gusa birashoboka ko bashobora kuba babi cyangwa imashini. Dushyigikiye ibikorwa nkibanga ryibanga, kandi dukora cyane kugirango duhuze ubuzima bwite numutekano. Niba warabonye ikibazo utekereza ko gishobora kugira ingaruka kumabanga yukoresha, nyamuneka twandikire kuri support@hcaptcha.com.
reporting-bugs-provide-feedback-text: Twishimiye ibitekerezo byanyu. Tumenyeshe ibibazo byose kandi tuzabikemura vuba.
reporting-bugs-security-text: Buri gihe dushishikajwe no kwakira raporo z'umutekano muke. Ohereza imeri@hcaptcha.com & CC umutekano@hcaptcha.com hanyuma tuzakugarukira vuba. Dufite kandi progaramu ya bug bounty ya raporo yumutekano yujuje ibisabwa kuri serivisi ya hCaptcha hamwe na code yinkomoko.
sec-hc-text: hCaptcha yibanze kubamamaza. Turakora kugirango duhe imbuga amakuru nyayo kandi tubareke bahitemo kuyakoresha. Ukuri ni inyungu zawe kandi ni izacu. Izindi capcha zitangwa namasosiyete yamamaza. Buri bote bahagaritse irashobora kugabanya amafaranga yinjira.
what-is-hcaptcha-text: HCaptcha ifasha serivise ukunda kurubuga kurinda bots, spam, no guhohoterwa mubaza ibibazo byoroshye byoroshye kubantu kandi bigoye kumashini.
why-hc-text: Igihe cyose usubije ikibazo, dukoresha moderi zinoze kugirango tumenye niba uri umuntu cyangwa imashini. Urubuga wasuye noneho rukoresha ibisubizo kugirango bigufashe kunoza uburambe kurubuga rwabo wirinda bots.
